root.texto: Thread on GITMO. 1). Digging around, trying to find any concrete evidence that GITMO is about to see a surge in new “residents.” And I found a few interesting things. #GITMO #Qanon #GreatAwakening #ReleasetheVideo #TheStorm #SethRich @POTUS 2). First, to rewind. On 1/13 & 2/11, Q did confirm that GITMO will be used as a detention center. #GITMO #Qanon #GreatAwakening #ReleasetheVideo #TheStorm #SethRich @POTUS https://t.co/cT041eJBsG 3). Keep in mind that there are currently over 13K sealed charges in the court system. And that Q has hinted at these sealed charges in a few posts: #GITMO #Qanon #GreatAwakening #ReleasetheVideo #TheStorm #SethRich @POTUS https://t.co/mVnxjOyWGw 4). Logically, if there is going to be a surge in GITMO population, then, GITMO would need to be greatly expanded. #GITMO #Qanon #GreatAwakening #ReleasetheVideo #TheStorm #SethRich @POTUS 5). And, it is. On July 7, the Navy announced a new $100 mln project at GITMO called “Contingency Mass Migration Complex.” #GITMO #Qanon #GreatAwakening #ReleasetheVideo #TheStorm #SethRich @POTUS https://t.co/9gcwGmSJkb https://t.co/rnCKjH33HW 6). The project is to essentially construct a tent city w/ facilities like water, electrical, sanitary, etc. And it will be built to house…. 13K “migrants” and 5K troops. #GITMO #Qanon #GreatAwakening #ReleasetheVideo #TheStorm #SethRich @POTUS https://t.co/rXsqgOiror 7). If it was being built for migrants from the US., then, DHS & ICE would certainly be involved. But, they are NOT. #GITMO #Qanon #GreatAwakening #ReleasetheVideo #TheStorm #SethRich @POTUS https://t.co/rDQDkN2s84 8). Further, the Navy would not answer why it concluded it needed to bring in 5K U.S forces to run an encampment housing 13K, supposedly, non-criminal migrants. #GITMO #Qanon #GreatAwakening #ReleasetheVideo #TheStorm #SethRich @POTUS https://t.co/eUFbtHMK52 9). That is not all they are doing for this project. They are also building a new $43 M fiber-optic link b/w GITMO & P.R. #GITMO #Qanon #GreatAwakening #ReleasetheVideo #TheStorm #SethRich @POTUS https://t.co/5yJB70Brop 10). Investing millions in housing & infrastructure into GITMO … for some theoretical mass-migration event to GITMO? Highly doubtful. #GITMO #Qanon #GreatAwakening #ReleasetheVideo #TheStorm #SethRich @POTUS 11). If planning on using GITMO to detain convicts, you’d probably want to visit the operations down there… #GITMO #Qanon #GreatAwakening #ReleasetheVideo #TheStorm #SethRich @POTUS 12). Which is exactly what Sessions & Mattis did in 2017. #GITMO #Qanon #GreatAwakening #ReleasetheVideo #TheStorm #SethRich @POTUS https://t.co/UfFTNLfjg3 13. If you are going to use GITMO as a detention camp, you’d want someone high in your cabinet to have experience there…. #GITMO #Qanon #GreatAwakening #ReleasetheVideo #TheStorm #SethRich @POTUS 14). Which Trump does, in Chief of Staff, Gen. John Kelly, who headed up GITMO as head of SOUTHCOM. Coincidences? Again, doubtful. #GITMO #Qanon #GreatAwakening #ReleasetheVideo #TheStorm #SethRich @POTUS https://t.co/iRt20AuPEE 15). Taken the above evidence, and Q’s confirmations, I’d say GITMO is abt to see a massive wave of new residents. END
